remarks:
A commutation law for restricted universal quantifiers that swaps the domains of the restriction.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-2004.) 

---

 A commutative law for restricted quantifiers that swaps the domain of the restriction.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-2004.)
statement: ralcom3 $p |- ( A. x e. A ( x e. B -> ph ) <-> A. x e. B ( x e. A -> ph ) ) $.
